WRITING.TEXT: I am so sorry for your loss :(

WRITING.TITLE: I was finally able to get this beauty to rebloom, I have had orchids for a long time and this is my first rebloom, I just wanted to share since this has been a long term goal of mine!

WRITING.TEXT: It #8217;s a modified aquarium that opens up in the front it has worked really well for me so far
[orchid tank](https://i.imgur.com/ZAgxFcB.jpg) Here it is sorry new to posting it took me a minute to figure out how to link the image but I got it
I just have an aquarium light sitting on top of it and high humidity plants inside with the orchids but I open the tank up and let it air out every other week
Thanks guys for all your support!

WRITING.TITLE: One month into my planted tank any ideas or criticism is welcome

WRITING.TEXT: The lights were recommended to be by the guy at my LFS they are the kessil tuna flora lights, do you have a better suggestion?

Any suggestions on where to find good driftwood I haven #8217;t been able to find very much and the ones I have in there have plates on the bottom so they would only fit in that way. Thank you for the advice!
Got it will do
Ok I #8217;ll give that a try thanks for the suggestion

WRITING.TITLE: My mom and dad looking amazing in the 70 #8217;s!
Big floof flop for lazy bunday!

WRITING.TEXT: I have three tanks like this and haven #8217;t lost a single one to jumping, one is a Betta sorority and the other two are community tanks with rasporas tetras and one male Betta in each. I think it just depends on the fish everyone has different personalities.
I just got one of these the other day I love him!

WRITING.TITLE: Cheap aquarium sand?
WRITING.TEXT: Is there a certain kind of sand that can be purchased cheaply at Lowe #8217;s/Home Depot that is aquarium safe and does anybody have an experience using it on their home aquarium?
Thank you
Ok awesome thank you
Thank you for the advice on that I will have to look into the pool filtration sand that sounds like a better option.
Hope he is ok sounds like he may have been hijacked I wonder what he was carrying in the truck and if that had something to do with it? It seems like a whole semi disappearing would be quite a feat.

WRITING.TITLE: Betta sorority finally up and running!

WRITING.TEXT: Thank you! I got it at my LFS I #8217;m lucky that they get nice driftwood pieces in from time to time.
Congratulations to you! I just found out the same thing and I feel the same feelings you are feeling. Thank you for sharing.

WRITING.TITLE: Does anybody have any preferences on where to buy seeds to start?

WRITING.TEXT: Thank you very much
Great news!
I #8217;m from Arizona this happens to me all the time.
Beautiful!

WRITING.TITLE: Help with plant identification! Got this for my first Mother #8217;s Day and want to repot it and let it grow. No information was given with it the leaves feel waxy if that helps at all. Thank you!

WRITING.TEXT: Thank you so much!

WRITING.TITLE: Beware the perfumed seneschal? Could this mean the boat Tyrion and Jorah are sailing on? Thoughts?

WRITING.TEXT: I had no idea, I just was reading and came on it and thought it was interesting.

I certainly did not pick up on it until the current re read I #8217;m doing now. I thought perhaps I had found something new. But of course these books have been picked through with a fine tooth comb for years now.
I just started listening to it. It #8217;s awesome.
